[[inst_hl_divu]]
==== HL.DIVU

*Syntax:* hl.divu SrcL, SrcR, ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Divide registers. Unsigned variant for DIVU.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_divu.svg[HL.DIVU encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU_MULTI_CYCLE
